tasks.title: Backend: Create Ping Endpoint
tasks.description: Create a simple `PingController` or route in `routes/api.php` (or `admin.php`) that returns `{"pong": true, "timestamp": ...}`. This validates the backend agent's ability to modify code.

tasks.title: Frontend: Integrate Ping
tasks.description: In `prohelper_admin`, add a temporary button (e.g., in the footer or a debug page) that calls the new Ping endpoint and logs the result to console. This validates the frontend agent's ability to read the backend's new API and use it.
